	//
	// double click pre
	window.onload=function(){document.body.addEventListener("dblclick",function(e){var t=e.target||e.srcElement;if(-1!==t.className.indexOf("prettyprint")||-1!==t.parentNode.className.indexOf("prettyprint")){var n,o;document.body.createTextRange?(n=document.body.createTextRange(),n.moveToElementText(t),n.select()):window.getSelection&&(o=window.getSelection(),n=document.createRange(),n.selectNodeContents(t),o.removeAllRanges(),o.addRange(n)),e.stopPropagation()}})};					
	//						

	

	//

	function init() {
	var imgDefer = document.getElementsByTagName('img');
	for (var i=0; i<imgDefer.length; i++) {
	if(imgDefer[i].getAttribute('data-src')) {
	imgDefer[i].setAttribute('src',imgDefer[i].getAttribute('data-src'));
	} } }
	window.onload = init;

	document.onreadystatechange = function(){
	if(document.readyState === 'complete'){
	function fadeOut(el){
	el.style.opacity = 1;
	(function fade() {
	if ((el.style.opacity -= .1) < 0) {
	el.style.display = "none";
	} else {
	setTimeout(fade, 10);
	}
	})();
	}
	function fadeIn(el){
	el.style.opacity = 0;
	el.style.display = "block";
	(function fade() {
	var val = parseFloat(el.style.opacity);
	if (!((val += .1) > 1)) {
	el.style.opacity = val;
	setTimeout(fade, 10);
	} 
	})();
	}			
	var menu = document.getElementById('click_mmeun');
	var menucontain = document.getElementById('header');
	var hidden_mmenuc = document.getElementById('hidden_mmenuc');
	var hidden_mmenub = document.getElementById('hidden_mmenub');
	var channelswrap = document.getElementsByClassName('channels-wrap')[0];
	menu.onclick = function(e){
	if (hidden_mmenuc.style.display == "none") {
	fadeIn(hidden_mmenuc);
	fadeIn(hidden_mmenub);
	fadeOut(channelswrap);
	}else {
	fadeOut(hidden_mmenuc);
	fadeOut(hidden_mmenub);
	fadeIn(channelswrap);
	}
	}
	hidden_mmenub.onclick = function(){
	fadeOut(hidden_mmenuc);
	fadeOut(hidden_mmenub);
	fadeIn(channelswrap);
	}
	}
	}
